name: Nocturnal Soundcloud Theme
description: Nocturnal theme for Soundcloud, the progress bar is grey and the avatar's spin.

user.name: Chloe Chantelle
user.about: Yo! I'm Chloe Chantelle, these are themes I make by either request or just using the site frequently. If you like what I do you can either donate or email me about a commission! uwu

additional_info:
13.08.17 - Fixed a lot of issues.
12.04.17 - Fixed related songs bg.
18.03.17 - Fixed random bg colors.
18.12.16 - Fixed music bar and icons.
6.11.16 - Removed premium ads, fixed small problems.
2.06.16 - Initial release.
